# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

add_subdirectory(cellar_node)
add_subdirectory(chaos_node)

add_library(yt-server-node)


target_compile_options(yt-server-node PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
)

target_include_directories(yt-server-node PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt
)

target_include_directories(yt-server-node PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/sparsehash/src
)

target_link_libraries(yt-server-node PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  core-service_discovery-yp
  library-query-engine
  library-query-row_comparer
  library-dns_over_rpc-server
  yt-library-re2
  yt-library-containers
  library-containers-cri
  yt-library-gpu
  library-tracing-jaeger
  yt-library-tcmalloc
  yt-library-monitoring
  yt-library-server_program
  yt-ytlib-distributed_throttler
  server-node-cellar_node
  server-node-chaos_node
  yt-server-tools
  ytserver
  server-lib-io
  server-lib-cellar_agent
  server-lib-chaos_node
  server-lib-chunk_server
  server-lib-exec_node
  server-lib-tablet_server
  server-lib-hydra
  lib-hydra-dry_run
  server-lib-lsm
  server-lib-misc
  server-lib-nbd
  server-lib-rpc
  server-lib-distributed_chunk_session_server
  server-lib-controller_agent
  library-cpp-getopt
  cpp-containers-bitset
  cpp-yt-phdr_cache
  libs-tcmalloc-malloc_extension
  contrib-libs-protobuf
)

target_proto_messages(yt-server-node PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/node/data_node/artifact.proto
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/node/exec_node/volume.proto
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/node/tablet_node/in_memory_service.proto
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/node/tablet_node/transaction_manager.proto
)


target_proto_outs(yt-server-node
  --cpp_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt
)

target_proto_addincls(yt-server-node
  ./yt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/contrib/cri-api
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/contrib/gogoproto
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/apache/orc-format/src/main/proto/orc/proto
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)
